name: The Mortgage Club
slogan: Institutional interest rates for individual borrowers on long-term fixed basis
description: The Mortgage Club is a mortgage loan platform collecting lending applications from hundreds of borrowers and arrange them in loan baskets based on credit worth. This enable us to negotiate the best market rate with lenders who issue mortgage offers to members directly on the platform.

team.name: Casper Arboll
team.bioHtml: I'm a senior commercial director with a diverse set of skills to get businesses and concepts from zero to one and onwards.

jobs.title: Business Development Intern
jobs.description:
Join us at The Mortgage Club and get the chance to build something truly unique. Something that matters and has the potential to change the UK mortgage market. We’ll give you the guidance and the tools for you to develop your talent. In return you’ll give us your best and show us why you deserve a full time position after the internship. 

We look for talented, ambitious people who are top of the class, but needs professional experience. This is a high impact internship and you will be working directly with senior management who come from roles as serial tech entrepreneurs and Goldman Sachs. 

We are looking for a business development intern to help bringing our product to market and execute the strategy. You’ll conduct market research, do outbound sales work,  speak to customers and contribute to the business strategy. You are a highly motivated self-starter who is thriving in a fast paced environment.

What you'll be doing:
Gather key prospect data
Own outbound campaigns on email and LinkedIn
Leading customer conversations and preparing presentations
Contribute to the business strategy

Who we are:
We are serial entrepreneurs and investment bankers about to revolutionise the UK mortgage market. We want to change the way mortgages are originated and introduce new consumer friendly products. We are bringing the first product to market in Q1 2020 and rapid expansion is on the horizon soon after. 

What you will get out of it:
- An incredible opportunity to be a part of an innovative FinTech start up.
- A great chance to develop your CV through taking on significant responsibilities from day one.
- One to one exposure to key management people, experienced entrepreneurs and city professionals.
- The ability to make a real impact, and to learn a huge amount in a short space of time.

Ideal experience and qualification:
- Bachelors or Masters Degree business and finance oriented studies
- Good understanding of finance and technology. 
- Previous work in a professional office environment (not essential).
- Entrepreneurial. You are excited by the challenge of building the future from scratch.

Email your CV and a short cover letter to casper@themortgageclub.com

jobs.title: Mortgage Product Manager
jobs.description:
### Who we are 

At TheMortgageClub we are about to revolutionise the UK mortgage market. We want to change the way mortgages are originated and introduce new consumer friendly products. We are bringing the first product to market in 2020 and rapid expansion is on the horizon soon after. 

### About the role 

Join us at The Mortgage Club and get the chance to drive innovation and change, building something truly unique. Something that matters and will change the UK mortgage market. We are looking for the right person and have other roles so please contact us even if you may think you are over or under qualified for this role. 

### What will the role involve? 

We are looking for an experienced mortgage professional to take on the role of Product Manager. You will help shape and realise our product vision and strategy. A key role fits someone with the in depth understanding of the current market and the capability to continuously refine the product and align our focus to deliver a product-market fit. 

### As Product Manager you will 

- Be responsible for the detailed process flow for our mortgages front to back 
- Help identify and assist with the integration of third-party services onto the platform 
- Work with the C level staff to help define the product vision, strategy, and roadmap 
- Design and operate on a data and testing driven approach to excellence 
- Track, evaluate, create visibility around and act on KPIs 
- Help the project management aspects of the programme 
- Research and develop new features and offerings 
- Work directly with our UX-, design and tech specialists to develop the best solutions 
- Leverage our corporate partner’s assets strategically and maximise impact 

### Expertise & Experience 

Minimum of two years’ experience in a Mortgage department 

Full understanding of the front to back mortgage process in detail 

Good understanding of banking environment and mortgage markets 

Ability to think outside the box and challenge the status quo 

### Interested? 

Email your CV and short cover letter to hello@themortgageclub.com to be considered for the role.
